text: Dana Robins Ivey (born August 12, 1941) is an American actress. In 1997, she won a Drama Desk Award. Her best known movie roles were in The Color Purple (1985), Dirty Rotten Scoundrels (1988), The Addams Family (1991), Home Alone 2: Lost in New York (1992), Two Weeks Notice (2002), Rush Hour 3 (2007), and The Help (2011). ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Atlanta
title: Dana Ivey
